    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static RentalManagement getInstance()
        Returns an instance of itself to create a singleton.
        Returns:
        An instance of the rental management system.

      • availableCars

        public static int availableCars(CarType typeOfCar)
        Returns the number of available cars in the system.
        Parameters:
        typeOfCar - An enum that represents the type of car that the user is requesting.
        Returns:
        An integer that represents the number of available cars in the system.

      • copyCar

        public Car copyCar(Car car)
        Copies a car object to create defensive copying.
        Parameters:
        car - The car object.
        Returns:
        A copied car object.

      • getRentedCars

        public java.util.List<Car> getRentedCars()
        Returns a collection of cars that have currently been issued to drivers.
        Returns:
        An array list of cars that have been issued.

      • getCar

        public Car getCar(DriverLicence licence)
        Returns the car currently in use by the driver.
        Parameters:
        licence - A licence object that represents the driver.
        Returns:
        The car object if a client is renting it and null if the driver is currently not renting a car.

      • setDate

        public java.util.Date setDate(int year)
        Manipulates the date using the calendar class and then sets it back as a date object.
        Parameters:
        year - An integer to represent the number of years back the date goes.
        Returns:
        A date object that is the new date that has been set.

      • issueCar

        public boolean issueCar(DriverLicence licence,
                        CarType typeOfCar)
        An issue car method that returns true if the car has been issued, and false if it hasn't.
        Parameters:
        licence - The driver that is trying to rent a car.
        typeOfCar - The type of car that the client has selected
        Returns:
        A boolean value that returns true if the car has been issued and false if it hasn't.

      • terminateRental

        public int terminateRental(DriverLicence licence)
        Method that terminates the contract between the client and the car that is currently rented.
        Parameters:
        licence - The driver that is returning the car
        Returns:
        An integer that represents the amount of fuel needed to be added back into the car, and -1 if there is an error with terminating the contract.
